description: Designed for days at the resort, the Cassiar LT Jacket provides lightweight protection in a trim, refined fit that moves with your body. The waterproof, windproof, breathable fabric has a brushed flannel backer for warmth. Features are thoughtful. The helmet compatible DropHood™ gives full coverage and protection, a powder skirt seals out snow, and a sleeve pocket holds your RF pass.
name: Arcteryx Cassiar LT Jacket - Mens
